articles.title: Bok flyhalf issues loom large as end of year tour peeks over the horizon | Sport - News24
articles.description: The Springboks completed the Rugby Championship and will head off to Europe for a four-match tour with huge question marks hanging over the flyhalf position.
articles.content:
In Durban
The Springboks have completed the Rugby Championship and will head off to Europe for a four-match tour with huge question marks hanging over the flyhalf position.
